resources.string: The app will recognise your face.
Prove your liveness by following the instructions on the screen.
Make sure there is enough lighting for your selfie. If you wear glasses make sure there is no glare.
If the scan fails to recognize your face, a time out error occurs after 10 seconds and you will have to start the selfie scan process again.
We cannot complete the identification process without these permissions. Please allow access to complete the identification process.
